title: Online Collaborative Learning Project to Strengthen Collegiality in Higher Education Partnerships

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Online Learning Tools and Basic Understanding of Higher Education Systems
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate with peers from diverse institutional backgrounds to explore collegiality elements in higher education partnerships, using digital tools for project execution and evaluation.

learning_goals: Learners can describe the core elements of collegiality (shared purpose, accountability, trust) in higher education partnerships.
Learners can design and implement international educational partnership scenarios using online collaborative tools.
Through project-based assessments, learners can propose and refine conflict-resolution strategies arising during collaborative processes.

resources: Online Collaborative Learning Platform (e.g., Google Workspace, Padlet)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
